extendedInfo.description: NFC Basic is an application that allows writing and reading data using wireless technology NFC. Allows you to write content following the NFC-FORUM standards, such as: -> Writing URL -> Writing text -> Writing contacts (vCard) -> Writing phones -> Writing sms -> Writing email -> Writing SmartPoster -> Writing application -> Writing map -> Clone tag Also can delete contents of any label.Allows writing tasks for Android phones, such as:-> Enable Wi-Fi-> Enable 3G-> Enable Bluetooth-> View battery information (status, voltage ...)-> Compass!-> Turn on Silent profile-> Turn on a continuous vibration-> Add events to the calendar-> Change screen timeoutIt also includes a new aspect. NFC Basic allows you to create your custom profiles, so you can do some actions in the same time.So, you can create a profile called "Home" for example, which will activate at the same time some actions, such as Enable Wifi, Disable Bluetooth , Enable 3G connection, set the Normal Mode and open the application Mobile News . With regard to reading, to read the contents of a label specifying: -> Type content -> Tag content -> Content Size -> Tag Size -> Access Modes of tag -> ID Tag -> Tag Type -> Android Technologies supported by the tagIn the next important version, including new features such as writing multiple records within the same message.Feel free to contribute ideas: dpizarro89@gmail.com

reviews.title: Excellent
